entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
